summary: PatchSequential orchestrates image augmentation by dividing each input tensor into a configurable grid of patches, then applying a sequence of augmentation modules either independently per patch or uniformly across all patches. It supports random selection of transformations, batch‑wise consistency, padding options, and reversible operations with parameter tracking.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, fine‑grained augmentation pipeline for computer‑vision models that enhances data diversity through localized transformations while allowing deterministic behavior and inversion of applied augmentations.
